title: Counting: Food & Drink (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Food & Drink subcategory within Counting. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Seven glasses of beer and eight glasses of sake, please.
cards.romaji: Biru nanahai to, sake happai wo kudasai.
cards.japanese: ビール七杯と、酒八杯をください。
お酒を六杯お願いします。
